thag7.2:1.1_0: Bhaddiya has plucked out craving, root and all,
thag7.2:1.3_0: and plucked out craving, root and all,
thag7.2:1.4_0: he practices absorption; he is truly well-favoured.
thag7.2:2.2_0: in arched harps, and in cymbals.
thag7.2:2.3_0: But here, at the foot of a tree,
thag7.2:2.4_0: I delight in the Buddha’s teaching.
thag7.2:3.1_0: If the Buddha were to grant me one wish,
thag7.2:3.2_0: and I were to get what I wished for,
thag7.2:3.3_0: I’d choose for the whole world
thag7.2:4.1_0: Those who’ve judged me on appearance,
thag7.2:4.2_0: and those swayed by my voice,
thag7.2:5.1_0: One who doesn’t know the world
thag7.2:5.2_0: nor do they see the other.
thag7.2:5.3_0: all the fools have plunged into them
thag7.2:5.4_0: they are seized by his voice.
thag7.2:6.1_0: One who doesn’t know the world
thag7.2:6.4_0: and a voiced by his voice.
thag7.2:7.4_0: they don’t get carried away by a voice.
thag7.2:7.5_0: ... with Bhaddiya the senior nun Bhaddiyad keeps going.
